    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Player constructor. Instantiates a new Player. Adds one cube of each color, sets points the player can give. Sets initial counter values for adrenaline, actionCounter.

      • addCube

        public void addCube​(Card.Color cubeColor)
        Adds cubes of different types to the available cubes of the player. Checks if there are less than 3 cubes. Is not possible to have more than three cubes of the same color.
        Parameters:
        cubeColor - the cube color

      • removeCube

        public void removeCube​(Card.Color cubeColor)

        Parameters:
        cubeColor - the cube color

      • increaseNDeaths

        public void increaseNDeaths()
        Sets deaths. When called (player death), nDeaths grows by 1. Cannot decrease.

        public void addWeapon​(Weapon newWeapon)
        Add weapons to the player's available weapons (max is 3)
        Parameters:
        newWeapon - the weapon

      • removeWeapon

        public void removeWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
        Remove weapons. Used when you have 3 weapons and you want a 4th one. Discards the weapon removed
        Parameters:
        weapon - the weapon

      • discardItem

        public void discardItem​(PowerUp powerUp)
        Discards the powerup chosen. Gives the player a cube of the color discarded.
        Parameters:
        powerUp - the power up

      • getDamage

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getDamage()
        Gets damage. Used for scoring purposes and to check if the player is dead.
        Returns:
        the damage

        Add damage.
        Parameters:

        Gets dead status.
        Returns:
        if dead

        Sets player to dead status for the turn.
        Parameters:
        dead - the dead

      • move

        public void move​(Square newPosition)
        Move player, generic move function. Called by particular actions if a move is possible once that action has been chosen.
        Parameters:
        newPosition - the new position

      • grabItem

        public void grabItem​(java.lang.String weaponName)
        Grab item, either weapon, power up or ammo cubes.
        Parameters:
        weaponName - the weapon to pick

      • afterShoot

        public void afterShoot​(Player playerTarget)
        After shoot player. Adds damage, marks, moves players based on weapon effect
        Parameters:
        playerTarget - the player target

      • reload

        public void reload​(Weapon weaponToReload)
        Reload. Calls reload method on the weapon the user wants to reload.
        Parameters:
        weaponToReload - the weapon to reload

      • calculateDeathPoints

        public void calculateDeathPoints()
        Calculate death points. Creates an arraylist of players, ordered from least points inflicted to most points inflicted.
